name: Verbal Self-Defense
description: Mastering communication techniques to neutralize gaslighting and regain conversational control.

cards.title: The Gray Rock Method
cards.description: Becoming emotionally unresponsive to gaslighters to remove their control mechanism.
cards.bulletpoints: Neutral Responses, Avoiding Emotional Hooks, Disengagement Techniques

cards.title: Reverse Gaslighting
cards.description: Flipping the manipulation back onto the gaslighter to force them into logical inconsistencies.
cards.bulletpoints: Mirroring Their Words, Circular Logic Reversal, The ‘Wait, What?’ Technique

cards.title: Boundary Enforcement Through Speech
cards.description: Setting firm verbal boundaries to shut down manipulative conversations immediately.
cards.bulletpoints: Direct Statements, No-Engagement Phrasing, Controlled Emotional Expression
